title: How ideas trump crises
description: The "dismal science" truly shines in this optimistic talk, as economist Alex Tabarrok argues free trade and globalization are shaping our once-divided world into a community of idea-sharing more healthy, happy and prosperous than anyone's predictions.
author: Alex Tabarrok
keywords: TED, talks, business, china, cities, culture, economics, future, global issues, happiness, health, history
